lines.text: You're right, Berna! We'll get out of this damned country! I'll get the money for the tickets somehow!
July 14th, 1897 - A boat from Alaka saied into San Francisco harbor... to upset the world!
What power has gold to make men endure it all?

[to other gold-seekers]
You hell-hounds! The devil's lollin' in the bay window of your souls while God's freezin' in the attic!

[Looking at his remaining matches in the freezng cold]
8 matches... 8 fires. We can fight hunger... but we CAN'T fight the cold!
Don't worry, partner. We've been through worse than this.

[Seeing Locasto enter Berna's room]
What right has this man here?

[to Berna]
Tell him... and tell him so he'll understand!

[to Larry]
So, you've found gold! There's not enough gold in the world to make things right again.
